author: Nexcell Pride
text:
An epic streaming ever... "Shadow Corridor", Rushia-hime finally managed to continue it.
At 2 previous streamings she had various problems, especially at the 2nd stream, when stream ended abruptely due to Towa's Birthday.
But now, finally get the end, despite game has too many endings. :_ちょうちょ:
Seriously... musical, mystery, competitive/cooperative and horror games are the strong points to her.

Rushia-hime mantained the good vibe since that 500 Kilo-Shock stream... Now she became to being each time more closer to fandeads and more lovely.

At great highlight during gameplay is her acting and making ambiance too (i. e. When earthquaking, her voice was shaking)
Definitively is an Innate idol... Innate, because without any preparation, not only her voice singing is cute and pretty, also her acting skills are so great. :_ハート: :_きゅん:

author: nazrin992
text:
>But now, finally get the end, despite game has too many endings

Correction here: this game has two endings. The default end which she got, and the true end where she has to collect gold magatamas from stages to unlock the secret stage along with actual final boss. Rushia mentioned she will play to get the true end and I will wish her luck because doing that requires her to play on NOT Easy difficulty and getting gold magatamas are tricky.

I agree with the rest (b' - ')b
